All three are underpinned by a scaled network offering of talent, capabilities, and services to support, grow and transform the worldâ€™s leading advertisers. Dentsu Media is transforming advertising as a force forgrowth, a force for good and has become the destination for employees to cultivate meaningful careers and for brands to accelerate previously unseen, sustainable growth.Job DescriptionDevelop and generate holistic performance reports covering a range of digital channels, including search, social media, programmatic advertising, and other relevant platforms.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather necessary data and metrics for inclusion in the reports.
Create post-campaign wrap reports that encapsulate the effectiveness and results of each digital campaign.
Utilize analytical tools and techniques to extract meaningful insights from data and present them in a clear and concise manner.
Gathering and procuring data from digital vendors (including direct purchase platforms like Samsung, Native touch, Waze, etc.) to formulate the report.
Comprehending the reports provided by the vendors and initiating further inquiries or follow-ups for enhanced clarity in cases where the reported figures lack coherence or are not easily interpretable.
Identify trends, patterns, and opportunities for optimization within digital campaigns through data analysis.
Collaborate with other team members teams to understand campaign objectives and KPIs (Key Performance Indicators) to ensure accurate reporting.
Stay up to date with industry trends and best practices in digital marketing and reporting.Experience in digital marketing, analytics, Reporting or a similar role.
Strong proficiency in analytical tools and platforms used for digital marketing reporting.
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to translate complex data insights into actionable recommendations.
Detail-oriented approach with the ability to maintain accuracy while working with large datasets.
Familiarity with various digital marketing channels, including search engines, social media platforms, programmatic advertising, etc.
Previous experience in creating wrap-up reports at the conclusion of campaigns is highly desirable.
Proficiency in data visualization tools and techniques is a plus.Job Details
